title: What Bosses Really Think About Returning to the Office
description: C.E.O.s are eager for employees to return — and afraid of alienating those who have grown accustomed to working from home.
dc:creator: David Gelles
media:credit: Erik Tanner for The New York Times
media:description: “We are working on some borrowed time, in terms of working on memories of the relationships you have and the connections you have,” said Mr. Pichai, Google’s chief executive.
